mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.scheduling_id AS "schedulingId", a.complete_num AS "completeNum", a.plan_date AS "planDate", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_complete_paln( id, scheduling_id, complete_num, plan_date, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{schedulingPlan.id}, #{completeNum}, #{planDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_complete_paln SET scheduling_id = #{schedulingId}, complete_num = #{completeNum}, plan_date = #{planDate}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE biz_complete_paln SET complete_status = 1 WHERE id IN
#{item}
